about_the_game:
A set of items that can be used for enhancing Mobile Suits and limit break.

Includes:
- 10,000,000 CAPITAL ticket
- 3rd Level Uncap Materials: (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)×10
- 4th Level Uncap Materials: (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)×5
- Expansion Part: Maebelfir's Tome (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)
Effect: Attack Type Changed to Beam / All barrier damage: up +25 / Beam Cut Rate: down -5.00

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
